recipe_text: Quantity; 900; Prepare 900 grams of chicken breasts| Measurement; 480; Measure out 480 grams of root beer| Measurement; 480; Measure out 480 grams of barbecue sauce| Quantity; 6; Prepare 6 hamburger buns| Untimed; None; Place chicken breasts in a slow cooker| Untimed; None; Pour root beer and barbecue sauce over the chicken| Untimed; None; Cover and cook on low heat| Timed; 18000; Cook for 5 hours| Untimed; None; Shred the chicken using two forks| Untimed; None; Assemble sandwiches by placing shredded chicken on hamburger buns| Finish; None; Serve and enjoy!
title: Slow Cooker Root Beer Chicken Sandwiches
